statements: DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE air_quality_level > 3 AND pollution_level < 5;
DELETE FROM PollutionData WHERE pollution_level > 50 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE city_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Pollution' AND sensor_reading > 50;
DELETE FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_level > 50 AND pollution_type = 'Industrial';
DELETE FROM AirQualityData WHERE location_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE location_id = 2 AND timestamp = '2022-02-15 12:30:00';
